mapper.select: select b.user_id ,b.product_no,b.select_size,b.product_price,b.select_count,image.upload_path, (select product_category from product where product_no = b.product_no), (select product_name from product where product_no = b.product_no) from basket as b ,product_image as image where user_id = #{userId} and image.product_no=b.product_no and image.main_image=1

select pro.product_name,pro.product_price, pro.product_category, image.upload_path from product as pro , product_image as image where image.main_image = 1 and pro.product_no = image.product_no and pro.product_no = #{productNo}
